name: Trio Theo in the Lost Island
name_original: Trio Theo in the Lost Island
description:
Trio Theo, a Hamsterian from the Isle Hamstero, has suddenly got sucked into strange portal that teleported him from his home island into a different island full of snakes and many black holes serving as the traps.

Please help Trio pass the difficult path in this island and get to the portal that will help him teleport back to the Isle Hamstero.

Hope you enjoy :)

- Sashabox
